job_details.Functieomschrijving:
To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            Are you ready to push the boundaries of AI? As a pivotal player in our Generative AI team, you'll design and implement cutting-edge solutions on our centralized AI platform, empowering CM.com's customers to manage and control AI-driven assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer, you will innovate by designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms, including LLMs, classification, and clustering techniques using familiar frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn. Leading the way, you will mentor junior colleagues, nurturing talent and sharing expertise in a collaborative environment. Collaboration is key as you work closely with the team to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            Currently, our product consists of a custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…). Part of your job will be to optimize the engine's performance and efficiency, all while staying informed of industry advancements to ensure our solutions remain at the forefront of technology. Additionally, you will contribute to shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap of our Generative AI initiatives, driving the future of intelligent customer interactions.
job_details.full_text:
Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer

To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            Are you ready to push the boundaries of AI? As a pivotal player in our Generative AI team, you'll design and implement cutting-edge solutions on our centralized AI platform, empowering CM.com's customers to manage and control AI-driven assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer, you will innovate by designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms, including LLMs, classification, and clustering techniques using familiar frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn. Leading the way, you will mentor junior colleagues, nurturing talent and sharing expertise in a collaborative environment. Collaboration is key as you work closely with the team to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            Currently, our product consists of a custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…). Part of your job will be to optimize the engine's performance and efficiency, all while staying informed of industry advancements to ensure our solutions remain at the forefront of technology. Additionally, you will contribute to shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap of our Generative AI initiatives, driving the future of intelligent customer interactions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing and implementing solutions using Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI, building AI-driven assistants, and developing customer-facing products. While it mentions traditional ML techniques like classification and clustering, the core focus is on generative AI applications, RAG systems (implied by 'functionality and control around Large Language Models'), and building AI agents, aligning strongly with the GenAI Engineer profile. The mention of 'custom-built inference engine' and 'optimizing the engine's performance and efficiency' also points towards building and maintaining production-grade systems.

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly mentions designing and developing 'state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms, including LLMs, classification, and clustering techniques'. This directly relates to the core process of creating and adapting models.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms, including LLMs, classification, and clustering techniques

job_tasks.justification: The role involves building 'innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio', and working with a 'custom-built inference engine' to provide 'fully customizable, autonomous AI agents'. This indicates traditional software development to integrate AI capabilities into applications.
job_tasks.phrase: build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions optimizing a 'custom-built inference engine' for performance and efficiency, which is a software development task related to backend systems powering AI functionalities.
job_tasks.phrase: optimize the engine's performance and efficiency

job_tasks.justification: The role is part of a 'Generative AI team' that 'focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models' and building 'AI-driven assistants' on a 'centralized AI platform'. This implies the operational aspects of deploying and managing these AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: design and implement cutting-edge solutions on our centralized AI platform, empowering CM.com's customers to manage and control AI-driven assistants

job_tasks.justification: The job involves contributing to 'shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap of our Generative AI initiatives, driving the future of intelligent customer interactions'. This requires understanding business goals and translating them into technical strategy.
job_tasks.phrase: contribute to shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap of our Generative AI initiatives

job_tasks.justification: The role specifically mentions working with 'Large Language Models' as part of the Generative AI team's focus.

soft_skills.phrase: optimize the engine's performance and efficiency
